Docs.summary: a menu item used to tear off and reattach its menu.

remarks.para: a is a special which is used to tear off and reattach its menu.

When its menu is shown normally, the is drawn as a dotted line indicating that the menu can be torn off. Activating it causes its menu to be torn off and displayed in its own window as a tearoff menu.

When its menu is shown as a tearoff menu, the is drawn as a dotted line which has a left pointing arrow graphic indicating that the tearoff menu can be reattached. Activating it will erase the tearoff menu window.
